p: To this end, to investigate the mechanisms of relaxation effects of the S. raeseri extract, the trachea rings were treated without or with CCh, without (CCh alone) or with 2 mg/mL of the S. raeseri extract, and without or with the inhibitor of NO synthases L-NAME (100 μM), or stimulator of NOS bradykinin (100 nM), or selective inhibitor of guanylyl cyclase ODQ (10 μM), or COX inhibitor indomethacin (10 μM), respectively.
